name: COLONY_1.WAD
description: This is a DEATHMATCH 2.0 pwad. Please play this wad with -altdeath only. You will lack the necessary ammo with origional deathmatch rules. All weapons are accessable and a marked exit is included. Monsters: CYBE! Just to keep you on the move. For BEST results, Play a four player net, ultra-violence, with respawn switched ON! Complete with its own SkyLight Dome Ceilings!
